extendedInfo.description: Hum This! Is a fun social music charades game with a social conscience! *************WIN FANTASTIC PRIZES***********************Official Partners HMV, O2 and Ticketmaster****It couldnât be simpler:1. You start a game by creating a team-mate with a friend or random user2. Choose from categories a song or TV theme tune to hum (or whistle, or la).3. You have ten seconds to give the best performance of the song you can (remember - no words!).4. Your friend receives your recital, and gets to guess the name of the song, using multiple choice.5. Now it is your friends turn!The aim of the game is to try and score the highest (Hum Run) tally of correctly guessed songs as possible without passing!Hum This is a ground-breaking cause related initiative created by Digital Giving supporting War child and music industry charity Nordoff Robbins. Official partners include O2 and HMV.Loads of fun updates coming soon plus categories and songs updated weekly.Features include:Â· Connect via Facebook or EmailÂ· 1,000âs of songs to choose fromÂ· Unlock new categories and songs.Â· Send and Share â Share your hum with your social networksÂ· âBankâ and save Hum runs.Â· Win fantastic prizes each month!Â· Global leaderboardÂ· Help support Nordoff Robbins and War Child to change children's lives.Â· Official partners O2, Hmv and TicketmasterCategories include:Â· 2000-2011 Smash Hits                     Â· Greatest Love Songs                     Â· 80âs Greatest Hits                           Â· Boybands and Crushes                 Â· Rock Anthems                                  Â· Girl Power (Taylor,Gaga, Katy)  Â· Hip Hopâs Finest                              Â· Dance Anthems                                               Â· American Tv Shows                        Â· Bollywood                                          Â· Children's TV (UK)                         Â· Countryâs Biggest Hits                   Â· Latin Hits                                             Â· Reggae Party                                  Â· Rat Pack                                              Â· Showtunes                                        Â· Greatest Metal Songs                   Â· Grunge/Indie/Alt Rock                 Â· Greatest Motown Songs             Â· Classic Country                                 Â· Greatest Punk Songs                     Hum This! supports the amazing work of Nordoff Robbins and War Child.To learn more please visit www.hum-this.com/charityhttp://www.hum-this.comhttp://www.nordoff-robbins.org.uk/http://www.warchild.org.uk/ http://www.digital-giving.comThis is a Digital Giving Production
